content.heroHeadline: Handmade pet accessories that show off their personality.
content.heroSubtitle: Durable, comfy, and irresistibly cute—crafted in small batches with love.

valueCards.title: Built to romp
valueCards.text: Everyday-tough materials with smooth finishes for sensitive pups.

valueCards.title: Made with care
valueCards.text: Each piece is assembled by hand and inspected before it ships.

valueCards.title: Sized just right
valueCards.text: From tiny necks to blocky heads - flexible sizing covered.

valueCards.title: Personal touches
valueCards.text: Add name beads or pick your bead palette for a one-of-a-kind look.

content.featuredText: Beaded collars, bowties, bandanas, and shirt collars designed to turn heads at the dog park.
content.aboutStory: Brynnie B's started with one very loved dog and a hobby for beadwork that got out of hand—in the best way. Today we design and handcraft small-batch accessories that are comfortable to wear and made to last.
aboutValues: Personalization is part of the fun.
We source thoughtfully and assemble by hand.
